runs.comm: 151 kph, half volley outside leg stump and McCullum whips it fine past Haddin for four
151 kpn, half volley on middle and McCullum pushes to mid on
151 kph, courage at its best as McCullum charges Tait and gets it on the full and pushes through the covers for four
151 kph, full again and McCullum pushes to mid off for a quick single
150 kph, Ingra moves to leg and it's far too wide of off stump
149 kph, Ingram backs away again and tries to launch it straight but misses
151 kph, good length from Tait, Ingram plays down the wrong line and is bowled! It just didn't seem as if he picked that one up - or any of the three...
full on off stump and McCullum hits nicely through the line over extra cover for four
dropped shorter this time, McCullum pulls from outside off and it takes the top edge, Harris moves back from short fine leg and can't get close enough to it.
good length and Guptill defends with soft hands square of the wicket and they scramble a quick single
Mcullum advances early and gets a leading edge into the off side.  Clarke picks up and hits the stump but McCullum is home safe
McCullum moves towards the off side and whips it fine of short fine leg
150 kph, good bouncer from Nannes and McCullum tries to hook but misses
148 kph, good channel and Guptill allows it through to the keeper
151 kph, fuller again and entices Guptill into the drive but he misses
148 kph, shorter and wide and Guptill shapes to cut but then pulls out
150 kph, angled down leg, Guptill tries to whip it off his pads but misses and it collects the thigh pad through to Haddin
fuller and Guptill slashes square, it takes the otuside edge and flies fine for four over gully
half volley and Guptill drives strongly through mid on for four, super stroke!
McCullum walks across to the off side again and Nannes goes full as McCullum works it off his pads through backward square for four
153 kph, McCullum charges this time and Nannes is shorter and quicker and McCullum tries to pull but misses
132 kph, slower ball at leg stump and McCullum clips it to short fine leg
149 kph, back of a length and Guptill plays it smartly with soft hands, defending into the off side
133 kph, slower ball and McCullum tries to play the 'Dil scoop' but it's just too high for him
147 kph, short delivery pulled powerfully through backward square for four where the man on the boundary misfields
142 kph, good length towards middle stump and Guptill gets an inside edge onto his pad and into the off side
yorker played to mid off ofr a quick single
McCullum advances this time and drives to mid off who does well to prevent the boundary
back of a length and McCullum pushes to point from the middle of the bat
fuller from Harris and Guptill times it perfectly on the up and hits it over mid off for four
half volley on off stump and Guptill drives powerfully to mid off on the bounce
half volley on middle and McCullum drives off the inside edge to deep square leg
150 kph, good length and Guptill uses the pace to play to third man
good length outside off and McCullum plays the 'Dil scoop' and gets it just fine enough for Haddin who is wrong-footed
full outside off and McCullum slog sweeps it high over mid wicket for half a dozen. McCullum on fire!
good length but too straight and it takes McCullum on the thigh and into the leg side
good channel from Nannes and Guptill is just content on rotating the strike as he uses the pace to third man
Harris hits the corridor of uncertainty and Guptill tries to use the pace again to play to third man but misses
good length, a fraction straight and Guptill drives in the air, he actually hits it too well and goes straight down the throat of Smith at long on
full and driven to mid off
good length and pushed to cover
Harris hits a good channel again and McCullum defends to cover
McCullum shapes to play the lap and then pushes into the off side. Wicket maiden for Harris, well bowled.
Taylor walks across to off and tries to slay it into the leg side but misses
driven to cover
really quick and he plays and misses
full outside off and Taylor drives square to the off side sweeper
shapes up for the sweep again and it's too quick for him
full outside off and Taylor plays late through square third man for four
good start from Smith and McCullum pushes back to the bowler
uses his feet and is beaten in flight and plays to third man
short and cut to White at backward point who does well to save the single
tossed up this time and pushed to cover
Taylor cuts to White again and he calls yes but McCullum sends him back and he's found short by a good throw
tossed up outside off and played nicely to long off like the 'Big Easy,' Ernie Els
angled into leg stump from around the wicket and pushed into the off side
shorter and cut to short third man
full and driven to deep mid wicket off the inside edge
117 kph, darted into leg and pushed into the off side from a mixture of bat and pad
angled into leg and whipped to mid wicket
full outside off and driven square to the off side sweeper
low full toss and driven powerfully through long off, beating the man on the fence
half volley driven straight to Clarke at mid wicket. The Australian captain made sure he watched that all the way into his hands after dropping a catch in Wellington. No mistake this time
low full toss and swept square past the man on the fence for four
short and driven through the off side to the sweeper
uses his feet this time and drives off the inside edge to long on
low full toss worked into the off side for a single
good length and Hopkins gives himself room and cuts over point for four
good channel from Christian and Hopkins plays inside the line and down to third man
slower ball, back of a length and he pushes into the off side for a comfortable single
Hopkins gives himself room and pushes to point where Clarke does well to keep the scoring to one
steps away to the off side and hits him on the pad as he looks to sweep, it takes him on the pad and runs fine for four
perfect yorker and McCullum drives back to the bowler
steps away to leg and plays to point for a sharp single
tossed up and crunched back past the bowler dead straight for four. That is timing!
tossed up again and he uses his feet and plays to long off
tossed up and slower from Smith and Hopkins mistimes a sweep into the leg side
decent legth fur McCullum sweeps nicely through the leg side, long on runs around to mid wicket and flicks it to the man closest to him but misses and it goes for four
advances again and pushes straight back to the bowler
full delivery and heaved in the air to long on
the 'Dil scoop' from McCullum timed perfectly over Haddin's head for four
bumper from Christian and McCullum hooks over fine leg for half a dozen
yorker dug out into the off side
low full toss, Hopkins uses depth of the crease and whips it low over square leg for a maximum. Hopkins' innovation at his best
low full toss whipped out to deep square on the bounce
short and just wide enough as Hopkins gives himself enough room to cut for four, super stroke
good length and Hopkins drives to mid off for a quick single. The throw misses and Hopkins would've been out
full on middle stump and McCullum plays the scoop over Haddin's head for four. I am at a BBQ at Andy McKay's place and he says, 'That is ridiculous!'
McCullum moves inside the line and leaves as it's wide of off stump. It was actually inside the line but harshly called wide
full on off stump and crucnhed to deep cover to the sweeper
slower ball from Harris, Hopkins drives, gets it wrong but square drives over point for six!
steps away to leg and drives to deep point. Hopkins playing an absolute gem here
full outsie off and driven on one leg to long on and they somehow get two
bumper from Nannes and Hopkins goes back and hooks off the top edge over the keeper for four but he's walked back onto his stumps. Disappointing end to a superb knock from the wee man
angled into leg and he works it fine
bumper again and McCullum hooks high into the stands for a maximum!
McCullum walks towards the off side and pulls Nannes into the stands again. Tough for the bowlers with such short boundaries here in Christchurch
waist high full toss and he works it to fine leg. McCullum not happy with the call as he thought it was a no ball
150 kph, inswinging yorker just outside leg and McCullum sccops fine for four more
perfect yorker and dug out into the off side
full otuside off and Oram plays and misses
Oram walks across to the off side and misses it and is cleaned out. Great delivery from the express paceman
yorker dug out off the inside edge into his back pad and they scramble a quick single
slower ball and McCullum plays it back to the bowler
bakc of a length and pushed into the off side, Clarke throws at the bowlers stumps and it misses, Nathan would've been short had it hit
bumper and McCullum pulls but misses
short and pulled powerfully flat into the stands for half a dozen
yorker heaved into the leg side and somehow it runs away through mid wicket for four
full and cracked straight down the ground for four!

full again and cracked through the off side to the sweeper. What a magnificent hundred from Brendon McCullum! He's played every stroke in the book and done it with aplomb. Andy McKay made a rather prophetic call earlier in the innings that McCullum would score a hundred and he has come through.
McCullum falls away to the off side and plays a miraculous scoop over the keepers' head for six!
advances and hits the yorker length and drives to the cover sweeper. He has overstepped as well.
this is well wide of off stump, Nathan plays and misses and they steal a bye too, he's overstepped again
walks across to off and whips it over deep backward square to the sweeper
full on leg stump and worked fine
the scoop comes out again and he gets six more! This is a phenomenal display from Brendon McCullum
cracked to deep cover
far too wide off off stump
he steps away to leg and plays to thid man off his back pad
full and swept off the edge to square leg on the fence
slog swept out to Warner at deep mid wicket who dives to try and take the catch but he picks it up on the half volley
tries to play the slog sweep, it takes a bottom edge behind Haddin, nobody knows where it's gone
half volley on middle on Nathan just hammers it straight over the bowlers' head for a maximum
yorker length outside off from around the wicket and he plays and misses
Hussey misses his length this his and Nathan goes inside out over extra cover for one bounce four
